name: Young Moon
description:
Young Light, one of the characters from my upcoming game Neon Night, has found himself on a moon and some bats are suddenly attacking him. He has nothing but himself to survive!

------

The game is a fast paced arcade where you must stay on a rotating moon while combating enemies that increase in numbers and types.

You can upgrade your weapon using items that fall from nowhere during the game.

Stay on the moon for as long as possible and comment your high score!

------

Note: This game was made as part of the Game Off 2020 Game Jam hosted by Github.

Github Repository link: https://github.com/AHAKuo/Young-Moon-Game-Off-2020-
